articles.title: Jesus Ferreira scores hat-trick as USMNT routs Saint Kitts and Nevis - FOX Sports
articles.description: The USMNT stayed unbeaten in the Gold Cup on Wednesday with a 6-0 thrashing of Saint Kitts and Nevis.
articles.content: Jesus Ferreira had a hat trick, Djordje Mihailovic scored twice and Bryan Reynolds also had a goal as the U.S. men's national team routed tiny Saint Kitts and Nevis 6-0 Wednesday in its second group … [+4277 chars]
